title: Futurama: The Beast with a Billion Backs
description:
-----------------------
Futurama: The Beast with a Billion Backs
Release Date: June 24, 2008
IMDB ID: tt1054485
-----------------------
Synopsis
-----------------------
Following directly after the events of Bender&#039;s Big Score, a giant rift in space and time allows a repulsive, planet-sized alien monster from another universe to come to Earth. The monster takes control of Fry, making him Pope of a new religion that sweeps the planet, eventually causing humanity to leave the planet and robots to inherit the Earth.
-----------------------
This release is dedicated to GENTLEMEN and Tom Green
-----------------------
